body:
Comment 4: 
I'm closing this since it hasn't recurred, it might be fixed by the http test races that
were already fixed, and it might be related to the EADDRINUSE stuff somehow:

https://golang.org/issue/1694

But there's nothing actionable here yet, except waiting. If/when FreeBSD breaks again I
can re-open or re-file.
_Status changed to **Duplicate**._
